item.title: Open the Debug Perspective
item.description: Select Window > Open Perspective > Other ...> Debug and click OK.

item.title: Stop the Application and Node
item.description:
In the Debug view, click the helloworld_configuration [Composite Application] node and click the Terminate button (red square). The application and node stop with the message:
stopNode -nodeName Node OK removeNode -nodeName Node OK

item.title: Stop the Server
item.description: In the Debug view, select the Server - [Tibco Host (Debug server)] node and click the Terminate button (red square). The tibcohost and localdebug processes stop.

item.title: Open the Modelling Perspective
item.description: Select Window > Open Perspective > Modelling and click OK.
